Text: I made an account just to post on this. This torrent after only being posted for 1 hr has managed to get 5 seeders and go as fast as 300 kb/s. i must say that i am very impressed with this torrent and i give everything a A+
Ive gotta know though how did you get this on here a full 5 days before its released. Ive been seeding this all night and i just realized it doesnt come out until the 23rd. lol kudos on you man.
People who own Max Payne 3 Special Edition, including myself, got a code to download the soundtrack.
Like xaxax said, I would  really like this in lossless.
